channel.title: Making new skill
channel.description: Okay, i have summoning charms, pounch and obelisk. now how to make the skill? ? i want this then i press on any pounch it gives summon exp and gp how to make new skill??

item.title: Making new skill
item.dc:creator: @s3x_4_u_l1f3 s3x 4 u l1f3
item.description:
@s3x_4_u_l1f3 wrote:

[quote="!Joshua, post:2, topic:310377"]Well first i’d like to ask: Why are you trying to make a new skill if you have no idea what you’re doing?

Also, if you want the pouches to give xp, or gp, just add an if statement under the item clicking method/packet. Sometimes called buryBones.

Edit: wasn’t paying attention the first time, fine now:

int pouchID = ####; // id of the pouch
if (itemID == pouchID) {
    addSkillXP(##, ##); // xp to receive, summoning skill ID
}

Not hard at all.[/quote]
and how to make the summoning skill id ?..its new skill

Read full topic

item.title: Making new skill
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well first i’d like to ask: Why are you trying to make a new skill if you have no idea what you’re doing?

Also, if you want the pouches to give xp, or gp, just add an if statement under the item clicking method/packet. Sometimes called buryBones.

Edit: wasn’t paying attention the first time, fine now:

int pouchID = ####; // id of the pouch
if (itemID == pouchID) {
    addSkillXP(##, ##); // xp to receive, summoning skill ID
}

Not hard at all.

Read full topic
